greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Table by antidiagonals where T(n,k)=sum_i T(floor[n/i],k-1) starting with T(n,0)=1 if n>0 and T(0,0)=0.
formula: T(n, k) =T(n-1, k)+A077592(n, k). Writing m as sum_i p_i^e_i, T(n, k)= sum_m{1<=m<=n} product_i C(k+e_i-1, e_i).
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Nov 08 2002
